thread.title: Wonderful customer service
thread.title_full: Wonderful customer service - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mary M
title: Wonderful customer service
text:
From the moment we arrived the service was outstanding. Evan and Paul at the front desk were wonderful. Drinks at the skytop bar were delicious and clearly the bartender knew about the wine and beverage business.
Room Tip: Choose the double high ceiling room with empire view for an extra special treat See more room tips
